00564 inline float CaloHit::GetSurroundingEnergy() const
00565 {

00570     catch (StatusCodeException &statusCodeException)
00571     {
00572         std::cout << "CaloHit::GetSurroundingEnergy " << statusCodeException.ToString() << std::endl;
00573         throw statusCodeException;
00574     }

00622 inline StatusCode CaloHit::GetMCParticle(const MCParticle *&pMCParticle) const
00623 {
00624     if (NULL == m_pMCParticle)
00625         return STATUS_CODE_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00626 
00627     pMCParticle = m_pMCParticle;
00628 
00629     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00630 }
